lines.gurmukhi: jYsy jl Doey ibnu AMbr mlIn hoq ibnu qyl myly jYsy kys hUM BieAwn hY
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Jal Dhoay Binu Anbar Maleen Hota , Binu Tayl Maylay Jaisay Kays Hoon Bhaiaan Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as a cloth not washed with water remains dirty; and the hair remains disheveled and entangled without application of oil;

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy ibnu mwNjy drpn joiq hIn hoq brKw ibhUMn jYsy Kyq mY n Dwn hY
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Binu Maanjay Darapan Joti Heen Hota , Barakhaa Bihoonn Jaisay Khayt Mai N Dhaan Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as a glass not cleaned cannot let the light come through and just as no crop grows in a field without rain,

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy ibnu dIpku Bvn AMDkwr hoq lony GiRiq ibnu jYsy Bojn smwn hY
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Binu Deepaku Bhavan Andhakaar Hota , Lonay Ghriti Binu Jaisay Bhojan Samaan Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as a house remains in darkness without a lamp and just as food tastes insipid without salt and ghee,

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy ibnu swDsMgiq jnm mrn duK imtq n BY Brm ibnu gur igAwn hY ]537]
lines.transliteration_english: Taisay Binu Saadhasangati Janam Maran Doukha , Mitat N Bhai Bharam Binu Gur Giaan Hai ?537?

Shabad OS B.translation: Similarly without the company of saintly souls and devotees of the True Guru, the distress of repeated births and death cannot be wiped out. Nor can worldly fears and suspicions be destroyed without practicing on the sermon of the True Guru.  (537)
